alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 4:55AM MST until January 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Northern Mohave County in Arizona, including Colorado City and Mount Trumbull. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for lightly traveled roadways. Slick conditions could be difficult to see after dark. Periods of heavier snowfall could also briefly reduce driving visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
